short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to hide the seen status on Facebook Story.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Take control of your privacy with the Facebook Seen Status Hider! This extension ensures that your seen status on Facebook stories remains hidden, allowing you to view stories without notifying the sender. Perfect for those who value their privacy and want to browse Facebook stories discreetly.

Features:

Hide Seen Status: Automatically blocks requests that update your seen status, ensuring your views remain anonymous.
Seamless Integration: Works in the background without affecting your browsing experience.
Easy to Use: Simply install the extension, and it starts working immediately. No configuration needed.
Secure and Private: Does not collect any personal data or browsing history.
